pages.text: Ya kehey kay agar Allah mujhay hidayat kerta to mein bhi paarsa logon mein hota
Ya azab ko dekh ker kahey kaash! Kay kissi tarah mera lot jana ho jata to mein bhi neko kaaro mein ho jata
Haan (haan) be-shak teray pass meri aayaten phonch chuki thin jinhen tu ney jhutlaya aur ghooroor takabbur kiya aur tu tha hi kafiron mein
Aur jin logon ney Allah per jhoot bandha hai to aap dekhen gay kay qayamat kay din unn kay chehray siyah hogaye hongay kiya takabbur kerney walon ka thikana jahannum mein nahi
Aur jin logon ney perhezgari ki unhen Allah Taalaa unn ki kamyabi kay sath bacha ley ga unhen koi dukh choo bhi na sakay ga aur na woh kissi tarah ghumgeen hongay
Allah her cheez ka peda kerney wala hai aur wohi her cheez per nigehbaan hai
Aasmano aur zamin ki kunjiyon ka malik wohi hai jin jin logon ney Allah ki aayaton ka inkar kiya wohi khasarah paney walay hain
Aap keh dijiye aey jahilo! Kiya tum mujh say Allah ka siwa auron ki ibadat ka kehtay ho

Yaqeenan teri taraf bhi aur tujh say pehlay (kay tamam nabiyon) ki taraf bhi wahee ki gaee hai kay agar tu ney shirk kiya to bila shuba tera amal zaya hojayega aur bil-yaqeen tu ziyan kaaron mein say hojayega
Bulkay tu Allah hi ki ibadat ker aur shukar kerney walon mein say hoja

Aur inn logon ney jaisi qadar Allah Taalaa ki kerni chahyey thi nahi ki sari zami qayamat kay din uss ki muthi mein hogi aur tamam aasman uss kay dahaney hath mein lapetay huyey hongay woh pak aur bartar hai her uss cheez say jissay log uss ka shareek banayen
